About.paragraph: I am Unity Developer from Rayong, Thailand. I have more than 7 years experience since I was student in 2012. Beside being developer, I also eager to learn in designing field include UI/UX, Game Effects, 2D and 3D. My core passion is on mobile for both game and application development. This makes me want to learn more in related stuffs to improve myself and broader my vision in application development.

Team.name: Second Runner-up
Team.job: Energy Animation Contest 2011, Ministry of Energy, Thailand

Features.title: Unity Dev
Features.text: Mobile Game, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality

Features.title: UI Design
Features.text: Game UI, Mobile Application UI, Web Application Design and more

Features.title: Graphic Design
Features.text: Logo Design, Web Design, Advertisement Design, Motion Graphic and more

Features.title: 3D & Game FX
Features.text: Model for Game and Game FX

Works.title: Unity
Works.text: Mobile Game, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Interactive Application and more

contents.title: Dancing Elf AR
contents.text: Fun side project for learning in ARKit & ARCore integrate with voice control and AR character. You can visit https://github.com/krispaisarn/Dancing-Elf-AR to see codebase and visit https://youtu.be/9h7bg8aIFPA for explanation video.

contents.title: Make a Bag
contents.text: Application for making customized bags on mobile. I worked since state of research and development in 3D term to application development. For this project I participated in many parts such as  bagâ€™s material integration with custom shader, worked closely with 3D team to figured out specification of 3D bag model that can smoothly customizable on mobile platform while keeping realistic of material and surface.

contents.title: Holo
contents.text: Research and development project that I worked in Malaysia to create application which works holographic display box. There are interactive figure, utility app and game.

contents.title: Koi
contents.text: Fun Side project to create easy playing casual game on mobile with minimal style of art.

contents.title: Chiang Mai II
contents.text: Virtual world experience on mobile, similar to Chiang Mai 1 but with a bigger scope and more details. I also worked and technical artist to guide 3D modeler about 3D assets and how to create proper low-poly models and textures for mobile platform.

contents.title: Sino Protoguese
contents.text: Virtual world of Phuket old town in the part. Basically, handled the rest of application beside 3D assets which were provided by 3D Designer.

contents.title: Wiz Magic
contents.text: Matching mobile game as side project to practice creating casual  puzzle game integrated with 3D character and cool effects.

contents.title: Sky Rider
contents.text: Fantasy endless running mobile game plus VR mode, Sky Rider was commercial project that I took part as various roles e.g. Developer, Level Designer, Effect Designer and Sound Designer. Beside mobile version of Sky Rider, there is VR mode that users can play by put mobile phone into cardboard and play with their head movement.

contents.title: Bipor
contents.text: Bipor is mobile edutainment project which was served for Ministry of Energy,Thailand. The project was made to encourage kids to save an energy. Player will play as Bipor the girl that need to solve daily problems. I was Developer, Level Designer and Script Writers for this project.

contents.title: Chedi Luang AR
contents.text: Study project in purpos of tourism by using AR technology. As Chedi Luang has been broken so AR can show user full form of Chedi in 3D view.

contents.title: Chiang Mai I
contents.text: Virtual world of ancient Chiang Mai city on mobile, I worked as solo developer and a help of 3D Designer who provided 3D assets. I managed to set up 3D scenes in Unity and did lighting part as well.

contents.title: Monster Land
contents.text: Spin-off side project from Monster In Thailand to create endless casual aRPG

contents.title: Monster In Thailand
contents.text: Individual study from last student year, the project also was summited to Thailand Software Contest 2013 and won a grand prize on entertainment category.

contents.title: ChiangGu
contents.text: Co-operative project between two faculties which are College of Arts, Media and Technology, Chiang Mai University and School of Photography and Video, Kyungil University. We made a decision to make mobile application which contains beautiful cinematography of two cities, Chiang Mai and Daegu. I worked and developer and motion graphic in application.

contents.title: Pao Pao Run
contents.text: Student project to create PC game based on cultural theme. Pao Pao Run is 3rd-person action survival game which users have to survive as long as they can.

contents.title: Crazy Factory Mobile UI
contents.text: Fun side project to design UI for mobile application for crazy-factory.com.

contents.title: Tripster UI
contents.text: Free-time project designing shraring trip application on mobile.

contents.title: Make a Bag Mobile UI
contents.text: Created handbag shopping app UI on mobile as UI design skill practice.

contents.title: Maxi Merci Web
contents.text: Web design for e-commerce website, Maximerci.

contents.title: Maxi Merci Ads
contents.text: Advertisement design for Maxi Merci which was used on Facebook or Instagram.

contents.title: Motion Graphic Works
contents.text: Part of my motion graphic works since I was student.

contents.title: 3D & 2D Works
contents.text: Some of my previous 3D & 2D works in various styles.

contents.title: Stop Motion Works
contents.text: My stop motion works since I was first year college student include "You Lost Me", the story about how cruel of human towards nature and "CAT Datacom" which won second place from CAT Datacom contest 2010 about communication imaginary.

contents.title: Logo Design Works
contents.text: Some showcase of my logo design and beside creating application logo, I also did some for commercial purpose.
